title: on me by sections 3 and 30(5) of the Education and Training Boards Act 2013
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Education and Training Boards
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Education and Training Boards 

Act 2013 (Local Authority Members) (Amendment) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited education training board act 2013 (local authority members) (amendment) regulation 2024

title: on me by sections 3 and 30(5) of the Education and Training Boards Act 2013
heading: 2. The Education and Training Boards Act 2013 (Local Authority
text_raw:
2. The Education and Training Boards Act 2013 (Local Authority 

Members) Regulations 2019 (S.I. 142/2019) are amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 2, by the substitution of the following for the 
definition of “Order of 2019”: 

“ ‘Order of 2024’ means the Education and Training Boards Act 
2013 (Composition of Local Authority Membership) Order 2024 
(S.I. No. 243 of 2024);”, 

(b) by the substitution of the following for Regulation 4: 

“4. For the purpose of these Regulations, each local authority 

shall – 

(a) 

(b) 

establish a panel of candidates 
for election 
comprising of all the female members of the local 
authority who seek election to the education and 
training board concerned, and 

establish a panel of candidates 
for election 
comprising of all the male members of the local 
authority who seek election to the education and 
training board concerned.” 

and 

(c) 

in Regulations 6, 7 and 8, by the substitution of “Order of 2024” 
for “Order of 2019”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 May, 2024. 

NORMA FOLEY, 

Minister for Education. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 31st May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [244] 3
